DESCRIPTION: Constricted characters lose HP after damage is dealt.
Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
Absolute value is a numbers distance from 0.
A 0 cost card that deals 3 damage, grants 3 block, draws one card, and Exhausts.
At the end of your turn increase by one and deal damage to ALL enemies.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
